text: Jadwiga Piłsudska-Jaraczewska (28 February 1920 – 16 November 2014) was a Polish pilot and architect. She served in the Air Transport Auxiliary during the Second World War. She is the one of two daughters of Marshal and Naczelnik Józef Piłsudski. She was born in Warsaw, Poland. Piłsudska died on 16 November 2014 in Warsaw at the age of 94.Death notice ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1920 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Polish architects Category:Aviators Category:People from Warsaw Category:World War II people
title: Jadwiga Piłsudska
